title: SR impact of MS growth on real i rates, output

content.question: Assuming the banking system has limited reserves, an increase in the money supply is most likely to have which of the following short-run effects on real interest rates and real output?

choices.label:
Real Interest Rates
 Real Output

Decrease
 Decrease

Real Interest Rates
 Real Output

Decrease
 Increase

Real Interest Rates
 Real Output

Increase
 Decrease

Real Interest Rates
 Real Output

Increase
 No change

Real Interest Rates
 Real Output

No change
 Increase

content.answer:
Real Interest Rates
 Real Output

Decrease
 Increase

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
